entries.meaning: A slate or enamel board for writing on with chalk; a predecessor to a whiteboard.

verbs.description: chalkboard (third-person singular simple present chalkboards, present participle chalkboarding, simple past and past participle chalkboarded)

entries.meaning: To write or draw on a chalkboard.
examples: If you live in a home where painting walls isn't permitted, chalkboarding is still an option for you.
